articles.title: ABOUT
articles.contents:
Alessandro Ghiretti | Phd Statistics
Statistician, data enthusiast, traveller and motrbike rider.
My name is Alessandro Ghiretti and I work as a Data Scientist. After graduating in Marketing I obtained a Phd in Statistics where I got interested in time series analysis, econometrics, robust statistics and outlier detection and machine learning.
R is my computing choice but in the past I have also spent time playing with Matlab and Python.
In my free time I like traveling, riding my motorbike (KTM 790 adventure S), listening music, reading and watching movies (Netflix addicted)
